name: Ball 2D: Crazy Soccer
description:
Ball 2D is all about reflex and strategy. Are you good enough to master the game? Play and find out. You will have tons of fun thanks to it.

Features:

  • 5 Game Modes (Soccer, Real Soccer, Hockey, Tennis, Darts)
  • 24 Stadiums
  • Multiplayer
  • Realistic Physics
  • T-Shirts Customization
  • Replays
  • Statistics
